description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=1/3. Zulu Hour is a top down shooter that's reminiscent of the classic genre, but contains modern graphics and gameplay.  Defend the planet in Campaign Mode or challenge a friend in Arcade Mode and see who can stay alive the longest!  Build up your arsenal - you're going to need it.
description.short: Zulu Hour is a top down shooter that's reminiscent of the classic genre, but contains modern graphics and gameplay.  Defend the planet in Campaign Mode or challenge a friend in Arcade Mode and see who can stay alive the longest!  Build up your arsenal - you're going to need it.
